column4: hey all.. im on 8.10, is it possible to get firefox2 instead of 3? ive tried to apt-get install firefox-2 but it doesnt work... firefox 3 crashes alot
ok  yes you could get Firefox 2, but  that's not being suppourted anymore as far as I know
and Linux has other good browsers
im aware of other browsers.. but how can i get 2 to install? it in the unsupported repo?
sure, but why FIrefox 2 instead of a good browser that is still being suppourted by it's makers
im sure ff will be fixed but i just wanna stick to it but on the older saver version
ff3 is a POS and idk why ubuntu supports it
if you want something that is like Firefox, and still  suppourted etc,  I know exactly what to recommend
and if you want stuff that isn't like Firefox, but good browsers, again I know what to recommend
it crashes when dealing with bookmarsk alot
have you tried Galeon and Epiphany?
